getFreeColor

public PlayerColor getFreeColor(TurnManager.PlayerLocation remoteOrLocal,
                                PlayerColor wantedColor,
                                boolean shouldSelectAnother)
Get a free player color.

Parameters:
remote - where is the player asking for the color from ?
wantedColor - try to allocate the color if it can be done.
shouldSelectAnother - true if the routine should give you another free if the wanted color is not free
Returns:
allocated color
